messages.title: Here in Pembrokeshire
messages.content: austerity is biting deep, Cuts are threatening local schools, hospitals and the most vulnerable in our society. We must stand together for the common good to end austerity, invest in local jobs and protect the natural environment upon which we all depend.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Yes to in investment in local schools
YES TO KEEPING THE NHS PUBLIC

issues.economy: With your Green vote we can reverse austerity, end the pay gap between men and women and create an environment fit for our children's future.
issues.education: Yes to investment in local schools
issues.environment: protect the natural environment upon which we all depend
issues.health: YES TO KEEPING THE NHS PUBLIC
issues.socialWelfare: Yes to fairer pensions and YES TO A LIVING WAGE

contactInformation.address: Jim Scott on behalf of Frances Bryant and Pembrokeshire Green Party/Plaid Werdd Sir Benfro c/o The Gate Keppoch St, Roath, Cardiff C24 3JW
